name: Fire Hand
text: Born with a torch in your hand, you have a gift with anything that burns.
benefit: You can wield a torch as a weapon without taking the nonproficient penalty and gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls with melee weapons that deal fire damage.
staminaText: When you hit with a torch attack, you can spend 1 stamina point. If you do, the fire damage dealt with that attack increases to 1d6 points of fire damage.
text_zh: 你生来掌中带有火炬胎记，在任何与焚烧有关的事情上都能显现非同一般的天赋。
benefit_zh: 你可以用火炬作为武器，并且不会由于不擅长而受到罚值，同时在使用近战武器造成火焰伤害时的攻击检定获得+1加值。
staminaText_zh: 当你用火炬攻击击中一个生物时，你可以消耗1点耐力。如果你这样做了，这次攻击造成的火焰伤害将会提升到1d6点火焰伤害。
